channel.title: Ok I NEED SERIOUS WEBCLIENT HELP! PLEASE HELP ! - Eclipsedz
channel.description:
Ok people I have my server and client now complete after my 1 year and 4 months work I have finished making them both the client was made using bluurs client anyway getting down to buisness I fail at making webclients nevertheless I am good with editing clients or making clients..
What I need help with:
I need help making my client into a webclient and then getting the webclient onto my website..
comments/emailing me/or sending me a pm if you can help me I will be very grateful - Im logged in most of the time on live messenger on this email GabrielPereira190@live.co.uk or you can send a message to this emails inbox GabrielPereira910@live.co.uk THANK YOU! :)

item.title: Ok I NEED SERIOUS WEBCLIENT HELP! PLEASE HELP ! - Eclipsedz
item.dc:creator: @Eclipsedz Eclipsedz
item.description:
@Eclipsedz wrote:

Nope at the moment I have the client as a normal client all that needs to be done I need someone to do it for me because Ive tryed and failed so many times even following tutorials so I want to send my client to someone to turn it into a webclient and jar and sign it for me then upload to my website

Read full topic
item.source: Ok I NEED SERIOUS WEBCLIENT HELP! PLEASE HELP ! - Eclipsedz

item.title: Ok I NEED SERIOUS WEBCLIENT HELP! PLEASE HELP ! - Eclipsedz
item.dc:creator: @dgk_all_day1 dgk_all_day
item.description:
@dgk_all_day1 wrote:

Have you edited your client to auto download the cache?

Thats what is needed.
Once you have done that, you need to make sure that the cache auto-downloads and extracts at localdisk
and make sure that in “class36.java” “modeldecompresser.java” and “sprites.java” the location where the cache is pulled from is the same as where the cache is saved in localdisk.

Then all you have to do is jar the file…
jar’ing is very simple it takes less than 2mintues to do

if you get to the point where you need to jar it and cant get it working? msn me at "sk8_allday@hotmail.com" and i can tv jar for you

Read full topic
item.source: Ok I NEED SERIOUS WEBCLIENT HELP! PLEASE HELP ! - Eclipsedz
